name: Jimmy Giraffe
description:
This is for the pattern only as a PDF which will be emailed to you after purchase.

The pattern comes with a supply list and full instructions with photos to assist you. The pattern pieces are full sized and can be printed on A4 paper and there is a page of softie making tips and hints.

Finished size
Large – 12 1/2 inches (32cm)
Small – 10 inches (25cm)

Large
1 fat quarter of fabric
Note: The body pieces can be cut from 1 fat quarter if you cut very carefully, but if the fabric is directional you will need 1/2
yard.
11 inches x 9 inches (27cm x 23cm) contrasting fabric
Black (or contrasting) Embroidery Thread
Polyester or wool stuffing

Small
1 fat quarter of fabric
11 inches x 9 inches (27cm x 23cm) contrasting fabric
Black (or contrasting) Embroidery Thread
Polyester or wool stuffing


Home sewers can make and sell items from this pattern. Please see my policies page for more information.

name: Sails on the Harbour PDF Pattern
description:
This is for the pattern only as a PDF which will be emailed to you after purchase.

Finished Quilt Size
140 cm X 162.5 cm (55 inches X 64 inches)

Fabric Requirements
1 jelly roll or 36 strips of fabric 2 1/2 inches wide
across the width of the fabric
1.75m (2yd) for the background
Large 60 degree triangle ruler
Batting – at least 160 cm x 182 cm (63 in x 72 in)
Backing - 3.4 m (3 3/4 yd)
Binding - 60cm (2/3 yd)

Home sewers can make and sell items from this pattern. Please see my policies page for more information.

name: Deep Space PDF Quilt Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Quilt Size
182 cm X 182 cm (72 inches X 72 inches) 

Fabric Requirements
50cm (5/8yd) of 4 different yellow prints
90cm (1yd) of 4 different grey solids

Batting – at least 198cm x 198cm (78in x 78in)
Backing - 4.3m (4 2/3 yd)
Binding - 65cm (2/3  yd)

There are also instructions for making a cushion from the offcuts and a mini quilt.

name: Cot Quilts
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Make two cot or lap quilts from one layer cake.
Each quilt uses twenty 10" squares and some background fabric.

Finished Quilt Sizes
Quilt 1
102cm X  112cm (40” X 44”)
Quilt 2
112cm x 122cm (44” x 48”)

Fabric Requirements
Quilt 1 
20 x 10” squares
55cm (5/8 yd) background fabric
Batting - at least 116cm x 127cm (46in x 50in)
Backing  - 1.25m (1 1/3 yds) my backing was nearly 44” wide so I only needed 1.25m(1 1/2 yds). If 		                  your backing is narrower you will need 2.25m (2 1/2 yds).
Binding - 40cm (1/2 yd)

Quilt 2   
20 x 10” squares (Alternatively you could use 80 charm squares)
90cm (1 yd) background fabric
Batting – at least 127cm x 137cm (50in x 54in)
Backing - 2.5m (2 3/4 yd)
Binding - Binding - 40cm (1/2 yd)

name: Beatrice Bunny PDF
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

This pattern is to make a rabbit that is 8" (21cm) sitting up.

The pattern comes with a supply list and full instructions with photos to assist you. The pattern pieces are full sized and can be printed on A4 paper and there is a page of softie making tips and hints.

Fabric Requirements
1 fat quarter of fabric A
1 fat eighth of fabric B
10” x 8” (25cm x 20cm) fabric C
Polyester or wool stuffing
Black embroidery cotton

name: Cosmo Caterpillar
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

This pattern is to make a caterpillar 12.5 inches (32cm) long.

The pattern comes with a supply list and full instructions with photos to assist you. The pattern pieces are full sized and can be printed on A4 paper and there is a page of softie making tips and hints.

Requirements
7 scraps of fabric about 8 x 8 inches  (20cm x 20cm)
16 inches x 7 (40cm x 17cm) rectangle of 
corduroy for the back
White felt – 2 inches x 1.5 inches (5cm x 4 cm)
Stranded embroidery cotton in white and black
Polyfill/Stuffing

name: Flitter Flutter - PDF Quilt Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Size:
180 cm X 212 cm (72 inches X 84 inches)

Fabric Requirements
15 fat quarters
180cm ( 2yd ) fabric for the background
60 cm (2/3 yd) fabric for the first border
110 cm (1 ¼  yd ) fabric for the second border
60cm (2/3 yd) fabric for the binding
Batting at least 200 cm x 230 cm (80 x 92 inches)
Backing – 4.8m (5 1/4yd)

name: Wagon Wheels - PDF Quilt Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Size:
158cm X  158cm (62 inches X 62 inches)

Fabric Requirements
16 fat quarters
1 1/4yd (1.3m) light coloured fabric or scraps or various light fabrics totalling this amount
2/3 yd (60cm) for sashing

Batting – at least 178cm x 178cm (70in x 70in)
Backing - 3.7m (4 yd)
Binding - 60cm (2/3 yd)

name: In Bloom - PDF Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Quilt Size
178 cm X 183 cm (70 inches X 72inches)

Fabric Requirements
1 jelly roll
2 3/4m (3yds) of background fabric
Batting – at least 200cm x 210cm (75in x 77in)
Backing - 4.5m (5 yd)
Binding - 60cm (2/3 yd)

name: Renaissance Garden - PDF Quilt Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Quilt Size
180 cm X 180 cm (72 inches X 72 inches)

Fabric Requirements
Quilt A
72 x 7 inch squares (or scrap fabrics totalling 3 – 3.5m) and
3 m ( 3 1/4yd ) contrasting fabric
or
Quilt B
15 fat quarters of light fabric and
15 fat quarters of medium or dark fabric

60cm (2/3 yd) for binding
Batting at least 200 cm x 200cm ( 80 x 80 inches)
Backing – 4.5m (5 yd)

name: Tulip Wonderland - PDF Quilt Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Quilt Size
170 cm X 150 cm (68 inches X 60 inches)
120 cm x 106cm (47 inches x 41.5 in)

Fabric Requirements
Large Quilt
1 Layer Cake or 33 x 10 inch squares
90cm ( 1yd ) for the background of the tulips and stems
45 cm (½ yd), for the first border
80cm ( 7/8 yd ) for the second border
50cm (5/8 yd) for binding
Batting at least 180 cm x 160 cm (72 x 64 inches)
Backing – 3.5m (3 7/8yd) or 3m plus left over squares from the top

Small Quilt
6 fat quarters for the flowers and square blocks
60cm (2/3yd) for the background of the tulips and stems
80cm (7/8 yd) for the stems and border
40cm (3/8yd) for the binding
Batting – 125cm x 140cm (49in x 55in)
Backing 2.5m (2 ¾ yd) or 1.5m plus left over fabrics from the quilt top

name: Through the Square Window - PDF Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Quilt Sizes
192cm x 170cm (76.5 x 68 inches)
128cm x 128cm (51 x 51 inches)
107cm x 80cm (42.5 x 32 inches)

Fabric Requirements
Large – 2 layer cakes or 72 10 inch squares
4m (4 3/8 yds) for backing
60cm (2/3 yd) for binding
2m x 2m piece of cotton batting

Medium – 1 layer cake or 36 10 inch squares
3m for backing
45cm (1/2 yard) for binding
1.5m x 1.5m piece of cotton batting

Small – ½ layer cake or 20 10 inch squares
1.3 m for backing
35cm for binding (3/8 yard)
1.3m x 1m piece of cotton batting

name: A Walk in the Garden - PDF Quilt Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Quilt measures 190cm x 157cm (75.5 x 62 inches).

Fabric Requirements
1 layer cake or 40 x10 inch squares
1 charm pack or 40 x 5 inch squares
1.8m (2 yd) background fabric
50 cm (5/8 yd) for first border
30cm (1/3 yd) for the second border
4.2m (4 2/3 yd) for backing
2.1 m x 1.8m piece of cotton batting
60cm (2/3 yd) for binding

name: Diamonds and Squares - PDF Quilt Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Quilt Size
115 cm X 152 cm (45 inches X 60 inches

Fabric Requirements
12 fat quarters
1.5m (1 2/3 yd) of background fabric
Batting – at least 135cm x 172cm (53in x 68in)
Backing - 2 3/4m (3 yd)
Binding - 45cm ( 1/2 yd)

Instructions are also given for 2 more sizes
152cm x 190 (60 inches x 75 inches)
190cm x 190 cm (75 inches x 75 inches)

name: In A Spin - PDF Quilt Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Quilt measures 1.8m x 1.8m (72 inches x 72 inches).

Fabric Requirements

Squares of 58 different fabrics measuring 10 inches square and squares of 6 fabrics measuring about 12 inches square. Or a total of 3.5m (3 ¾ yds) patterned fabrics.
2 ¾ m (3 yds) plain fabric.
4m (4 3/8 yds) for the backing
60cm (2/3 yd) for binding
2m by 2m piece cotton batting

name: Crossroads - PDF Quilt Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Quilt measures 193cm x 193cm (76 x 76 inches).

Fabric Requirements
1 layer cake
1 charm pack (of the same fabric as the layer cake)
1.5m (1.5 yds) for sashing
20cm (1/4 yd) contrast for sashing
60cm (2/3 yd) for border 1
1.1m (1 1/4 yd) for border 2
Batting – at least 215cm x 215cm (80in x 80in)
Backing - 4.5m (5 yd)
Binding - 60cm (2/3 yd)

name: Nina's Flowers - PDF Quilt Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Quilt measures 1.8m x 1.8m (72 inches x 72 inches).

Fabric Requirements
1 Jelly Roll of 40 strips of fabric 2 ½ inches wide and 42 inches long
2 m (2 1/4 yds) background fabric
60cm (2/3 yds) border fabric
4m (4 3/8 yds) for backing
60cm (2/3 yd) for binding
2m by 2m piece cotton batting

name: Flower Kisses - PDF Quilt Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Quilt measures 165 cm x 165cm (66 inches x 66 inches).

Fabric Requirements
1 layer cake or 36 x10 inch squares
1 charm pack or 36 x 4 inch squares
90cm (1 yd) background fabric
50 cm (5/8 yd) for first border
90cm (1 yd) for the second border
3.8m (4 ¼ yd)for the backing
1.9 m x 1.9m piece of cotton batting
60cm (2/3 yd) for binding

Instructions also included for Frog Hugs.
Finished size - 88cm x 110cm (35 inches x 44 inches).

Fabric Requirements
12 x 10 inch squares
12 x 4 inch squares
30cm (1/3 yd) of background fabric
25cm (1/3 yd) for first border
40cm (3/8 yd) for second border
1.3m (1 ½ yd) for the backing
1.1m x 1.3m piece of cotton batting
40cm (1/2 yd) for binding

name: Persian Garden - PDF Quilt Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

Finished Quilt Size
180 cm X 225 cm (90 inches X 72 inches)

Fabric Requirements
1 Layer Cake or 40 x 10 inch squares
3m ( 3 1/4yd ) contrasting fabric
70cm (3/4 yd) for binding
Batting at least 200 cm x 245cm ( 80 x 98 inches)
Backing – 5m (5 1/2 yd)

name: Harry Hippo - PDF Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

This pattern is to make a hippo 25 cm x 11.5 cm (10 in x 4.5in).

The pattern comes with a supply list and full instructions with photos to assist you. The pattern pieces are full sized and can be printed on A4 paper and there is a page of softie making tips and hints.

name: Fergus Fish PDF Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

This pattern is to make a fish 5 inches (12.5cm) wide and high (without tail and spikes).

The pattern comes with a supply list and full instructions with photos to assist you. The pattern pieces are full sized and can be printed on A4 paper and there is a page of softie making tips and hints.

name: Pippa Platypus - PDF Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

This pattern is to make a platypus 14 inches (35cm) long and a baby platypus 7 inches (18cm) long.

The pattern comes with a supply list and full instructions with photos to assist you. The pattern pieces are full sized and can be printed on A4 paper and there is a page of softie making tips and hints.

name: Eli Elephant - PDF Pattern
description:
This is for the PDF Pattern only which will be emailed to you.

This pattern is to make an elephant 18cm x 12.5 cm (7 in x 5in) in size. Instead of felt try making him in cotton, corduroy or wool.

Tha pattern comes with a supply list and full instructions with some photos to assist you. The pattern pieces are full sized and can be printed on A4 paper and there is a page of softie making tips and hints.

Fabric Requirements
Felt - 46cm x 25cm (18 in x 10in)
Cotton fabric - 28cm x 15cm (11in x 8in)
Black embroidery cotton
Polyester fibre fill
